text: They have mitten-like hands and feet that are more defined, resembling blue shoes with light blue soles, presumably made out of ice
name: Mr. Mime

text: Mr
name: Mr. Mime

text: Mime are very prideful of their pantomime acts, and will heavily slap anyone that interrupts them while miming
name: Mr. Mime

text: They can often be seen performing in the streets of cities and towns, where they mime in exchange for food

text: Galarian Mr
name: Mr. Mime

name: Mr. Mime

text: Rime's influence over Mime Jr
name: Mr. Mime

text: imitating their dance steps
name: Mr. Mime

text: Pokémon are commonly seen performing for food in large cities, especially in the cold north of the region
name: Mr. Mime

text: In fact, some people believed that they evolved to tap-dance specifically to cater to the tastes of Galarian city dwellers, who were more likely to reward dancing Mr
name: Mr. Mime

text: Mime with food
name: Mr. Mime

text: In the winter months, they will visit towns further south as traveling troupes, much to the delight of children across the region
name: Mr. Mime

text: Mr
name: Mr. Mime

text: Mime are gifted with the art of miming at a young age, but as they mature, they gain the ability to make invisible objects by emitting energy from their fingers and minutely vibrating their fingertips to harden the air around them and form a wall
name: Mr. Mime

text: Barriers generated this way can repel harsh attacks, and its gestures and motions can convince watchers that something unseeable actually exists once this is achieved, the perceived item will materialize
name: Mr. Mime

text: Through their feet, Galarian Mr
name: Mr. Mime

text: Mime are able to control the temperature and create a floor of ice, which they can kick up to act as a barrier
name: Mr. Mime

name: Mr. Mime

text: Mime is the evolved form of Mime Jr
name: Mr. Mime

text: It evolves from Mime Jr
name: Mr. Mime

text: when it levels up while knowing the move Mimic
name: Mr. Mime

name: Mr. Mime

text: Mime is a bipedal, humanoid Pokémon
name: Mr. Mime

text: Blue growths resembling clown hair extend from the sides of its pale pink head, and there is a magenta circle on each cheek
name: Mr. Mime

text: Its jaw is curved inward, resembling the mouth of a wooden dummy
name: Mr. Mime

text: It has a round, white body with a magenta spot in the middle, light pink arms and legs that connect to its body via magenta spheres, and small white coverings over its knees
name: Mr. Mime

text: Its white hands resemble gloves with magenta pads on the tips of its white fingers and its dark blue feet curl upward at the tips
name: Mr. Mime

text: From birth, this Pokémon is an excellent pantomime
name: Mr. Mime

text: As it matures, it gains the ability to solidify air molecules by vibrating its fingertips
name: Mr. Mime

text: This ability allows it to create invisible objects with its gestures
name: Mr. Mime

text: It punishes those who interrupt its act or are not impressed by slapping them
name: Mr. Mime

text: Mr
name: Mr. Mime

text: Mime is usually very rare, but can be found in suburban areas
name: Mr. Mime

text: In Generation II, Substitute was its signature move
name: Mr. Mime

text: Galarian Mr
name: Mr. Mime

text: Mime are mostly blue and white
name: Mr. Mime

text: It also has blue growths resembling clown hair on its pale head however, these also extend and cover its cheeks, creating a mutton chop style sideburn effect resembling earmuffs
name: Mr. Mime

text: It has wider-shaped eyes and a small blue triangle for a nose
name: Mr. Mime

text: It has a suit-like body comprising a white top, blue shoulder spheres, blue bottom trousers, and a diamond-shaped crystal that resembles a tie
name: Mr. Mime

text: It has mitten-like hands and feet that are more defined, resembling blue shoes with light blue soles, presumably made out of ice
name: Mr. Mime

text: Through its feet, it is able to control the temperature and create a floor of ice, which it can kick up to act as a barrier
name: Mr. Mime

text: It is widely known in the region for its talent in tap dancing (contrasting Kantonian Mr
name: Mr. Mime

text: Scyther resembles a mantis
name: Scyther

text: It is green with two wings that enable flight
name: Scyther

text: It has two razor-sharp scythes for arms are cream-colored section between its head, thorax, and abdomen
name: Scyther

text: Its feet are tall and almost extends its thighs, rounded, and conical each foot ends in three small, white claws on its front side
name: Scyther

text: Scyther is an adept hunter that tears at its prey with its scythes
name: Scyther

text: Thanks to its green coloration, it can camouflage itself well in the grasslands and forests where it lives
name: Scyther

text: Humans rarely encounter wild Scyther in these areas, however
name: Scyther

text: Said to be like a ninja, Scyther can move so quickly that it cannot be followed, increasing the effectiveness of its scythes
name: Scyther

text: It maintains the sharpness of its blades through battle as well as by cutting through hard objects, such as trees it can cut down a massive tree with just a single slice
name: Scyther

text: Wild Scyther form swarms with a single leader chosen through combat
name: Scyther

text: When a challenger successfully defeats a current leader and replaced it, the defeated leader is exiled from the swarm
name: Scyther

text: It has also been shown that Scyther becomes more aggressive than those of the swarm
name: Scyther

text: Groves of cleanly-cut stumps are a sign of Scyther pack territory
name: Scyther

text: Scyther can have the ability Swarm or the ability Technician
name: Scyther

text: Swarm increases Scyther's Bug-type moves by 1
name: Scyther

text: 5x when its HP is lower than 1/3
name: Scyther

text: Technician increases the power of moves under 60 attack power
name: Scyther

text: Scyther's most impressive feature is its scythe-like arms that can easily cut through metal
name: Scyther

text: Scyther is also known for its agility
name: Scyther

text: While hunting in the wild or in a battle between trainers, it relies on its speed to strike quickly and to avoid being struck in return by its foe
name: Scyther

text: Its high-supernatural speed can make it seem to be in more than one place at once, or to seem invisible as it moves in, strikes, and leaves the opponent before he can feel the blow
name: Scyther

text: Scyther's wings are capable of flight, but this is rare it is not a fast or an agile flier, and it is a better hunter on its own feet
name: Scyther

text: The difference between a male and female Scyther is by the size of its abdomen
name: Scyther

text: The females will be a bit larger than the males
name: Scyther

text: Scyther evolves into Scizor when traded while holding Metal Coat
name: Scyther

text: In the Hisui region, it evolves into Kleavor
name: Scyther

text: Scyther is a bipedal, insectoid Pokémon
name: Scyther

text: Its body is primarily green and has a thin, cream-colored section between its head, thorax, and abdomen
name: Scyther

text: Female Scyther have larger abdomens than male Scyther
name: Scyther

text: Its reptilian head has two narrow, triangular eyes and three blunt horns extending from its forehead
name: Scyther

text: Its arms end in large, white scythes, which it uses for both hunting and fighting
name: Scyther

text: Two pairs of cream-colored wings extend from its back
name: Scyther

text: While these wings do allow Scyther to fly, it rarely does so
name: Scyther

text: Scyther's thighs have large, upward-pointing spikes
name: Scyther

text: Its feet are tall, rounded, and conical, almost extending to its thighs each foot ends in three small, white claws on its front side
name: Scyther

text: Scyther is an adept hunter that tears at its prey with its scythes
name: Scyther

text: Thanks to its green coloration, it can camouflage itself well in the grasslands and forests where it lives
name: Scyther

text: Humans rarely encounter wild Scyther in these areas, however
name: Scyther

text: Said to be like a ninja, Scyther can move so quickly that it cannot be followed, increasing the effectiveness of its scythes
name: Scyther

text: It maintains the sharpness of its blades through battle as well as by cutting through hard objects, such as trees it can cut down a massive tree with just a single slice, although it cannot penetrate Tarountula's elastic threads
name: Scyther

text: The anime has shown that wild Scyther form swarms with a single leader chosen through combat
name: Scyther

text: When a challenger successfully defeats a current leader and replaces it, the defeated leader is exiled from the swarm
name: Scyther

text: It has also been shown that Scyther becomes aggressive when faced with the color red
name: Scyther

text: Jynx is a purple-skinned humanoid Pokémon
name: Jynx

text: It has long blonde hair and a flowing lower body which resembles a red dress, the top of which has a red chestplate outlined in gold that most closely resembles female breasts, as well as luscious pink lips
name: Jynx

text: Its hands have five fingers each and its arms are white
name: Jynx

text: Jynx is a female-only species with no male counterpart
name: Jynx

text: Jynx originally had black skin, which was dropped due to the resemblance to blackface and the response of a small group of activists to the resemblance
name: Jynx

text: Jynx are found in secluded, snowy areas
name: Jynx

text: Though rare, they seem to become more common during strong blizzards
name: Jynx

text: As Jynx walk, they sway their hips alluringly
name: Jynx

text: Depending on their emotions, they may move in slightly different manners
name: Jynx

text: Their strange movements compel those who see them to move with them, dancing in unison
name: Jynx

text: Those moving may not even realize they are swaying their hips until someone else (who is probably also dancing) points it out to them
name: Jynx

text: Jynx use their dancing to talk to one another
name: Jynx

text: However, they also have a form of oral speech, which sounds ​uncannily similar to a foreign human language
name: Jynx

text: For this reason, some musicians have written songs specifically for Jynx to sing
name: Jynx

text: Despite their curious behavior, Jynx are kind Pokémon
name: Jynx

text: As they walk and sway, people and Pokémon alike subconsciously follow them
name: Jynx

text: During blizzards, they will often lead these hypnotized beings to safety away from the cold
name: Jynx

text: Then, they disappear almost as quickly as they appeared
name: Jynx

text: When Jynx walk, they mysteriously leave no footprints in the snow
name: Jynx

text: In rural, barren regions of Galar, Jynx are known in folklore as Queens of Ice and are worshiped for their beautiful singing and dancing
name: Jynx

text: Jynx can have the ability Oblivious or the ability Forewarn
name: Jynx

text: Oblivious grants Jynx immunity to infatuation
name: Jynx

text: Forewarn allows Jynx to identify the opponent's move with the highest attack power
name: Jynx

text: Jynx is the evolved form of Smoochum as of level 30
name: Jynx

text: Jynx is a bipedal, humanoid Pokémon that resembles a woman
name: Jynx

text: It has a purple face, pink lips, saucer-like eyes, and long blonde hair
name: Jynx

text: It wears a red gown with two gold circlets on the chest
name: Jynx

text: While the anime has shown it to possess feet, the 3D games show only blackness under the dress and it lacks a footprint
name: Jynx

text: Despite this, it is able to learn the kicking move Triple Axel
name: Jynx

text: It has white arms and five-fingered purple hands
name: Jynx

text: Jynx is a female-only species with no male counterpart
name: Jynx

text: Originally, its face was colored black
name: Jynx

text: Pokémon Stadium's fainting animation had it disappear leaving only its hair behind, implying that what appears to be dark-colored skin is actually just darkness
name: Jynx

text: Jynx has a language that sounds similar to human speech and includes several cry patterns
name: Jynx

text: However, this language has yet to be deciphered
name: Jynx

text: It prefers to communicate by using dance-like movements
name: Jynx

text: There are some musicians who compose songs for Jynx to sing
name: Jynx

text: These rhythmic movements often cause people to dance along with it
name: Jynx

text: The Jynx in Alola are said to have wonderful precise movements
name: Jynx

text: In certain parts of Galar, it has been feared and worshiped while being called the Queen of Ice
name: Jynx

text: The Jynx in Galar are said to have beautiful and delicate voices and a fanbase dedicated to them
name: Jynx

text: Jynx often is found in urban areas
name: Jynx

text: Jynx is the only known Pokémon capable of learning the move Lovely Kiss by leveling up
name: Jynx

text: Electabuzz is a type of bipedal, feline-like Pokémon with bright yellow coloring and black stripes
name: Electabuzz

text: It has lightning bolt shaped-markings on its body and large forearms
name: Electabuzz

text: Some of its feline properties are its long tail which resembles a tiger's and large fangs
name: Electabuzz

text: Its two legs are short, and its feet are large with two sharp claws on either one
name: Electabuzz

text: The more human aspects of its appearance are its long arms and five-digit hands
name: Electabuzz

text: Electabuzz often gather in groups to wait for oncoming storms, and tend to race for lightning bolts to eat
name: Electabuzz

text: They cause power outages when they feed off power plants, and such facilities often employ Ground-type Pokémon as a preventive measure due to Electabuzz's weakness to the type
name: Electabuzz

text: many areas actually employ Electabuzz as natural lightning rods
name: Electabuzz

text: Most Electabuzz possess the ability Static which allows the opponent to have a one-third chance to become paralyzed when it uses a physical attack on Electabuzz
name: Electabuzz

text: Electabuzz's body is filled with electricity which can sometimes cause accidental blackouts
name: Electabuzz

text: It is said that its body glows whitish-blue hue when in the dark
name: Electabuzz

text: However, it has been known to leak more electricity than it takes in
name: Electabuzz

text: Much like Ash's Pikachu and Clemont's Dedenne, they can communicate via electricity
name: Electabuzz

text: Electabuzz is a master of Electric-type moves but can also use Physical and Elemental punches, such as Brick Break
name: Electabuzz

text: Electabuzz is the evolved form of Elekid
name: Electabuzz

text: Electabuzz is a slightly humanoid Pokémon with a few feline traits
name: Electabuzz

text: It has antennae with bulbous tips where its ears should be, two long tufts of fur on top of its head, small eyes, and two large fangs in its upper jaw
name: Electabuzz

text: It is covered in yellow fur with many black stripes
name: Electabuzz

text: There is a large, lightning bolt-shaped stripe on Electabuzz's chest, a V-shaped stripe on its forehead, one stripe on its side, a thick stripe down its back, two bands on each leg, several broken bands on each arm, and many rings around its long tail
name: Electabuzz

text: There are three clawed toes on each of its feet, two in front and one in back, and five fingers on each hand
name: Electabuzz

text: In the dark, Electabuzz will glow light blue from the electrical charges running across its body
name: Electabuzz

text: It is constantly leaking more electricity than it consumes
name: Electabuzz

text: Electabuzz often gathered groups around tall trees in order to wait for the upcoming storm
name: Electabuzz

text: During torrential thunderstorms, Electabuzz will compete to find locations likely to be struck by lightning in order to absorb the electric power
name: Electabuzz

text: Electabuzz is often used as an alternative to lightning rods because it is unharmed by the absorption of electricity
name: Electabuzz

text: It is also capable of entirely nonverbal communication via electrical currents when in close proximity to another of its species
name: Electabuzz

text: Blackouts have been known to happen when groups of Electabuzz gather to consume electricity of power plants, thus often gets blamed for the occurring power outages
name: Electabuzz

text: As a result, Ground-type Pokémon are kept around power plants to keep Electabuzz from raiding, although the blackouts are usually the fault of the electric companies, not Electabuzz
name: Electabuzz

text: As demonstrated in the anime, Electabuzz is sent into a rage by the color red
name: Electabuzz

text: In battle, Electabuzz windmills its arms, apparently to add momentum to its punches
name: Electabuzz

text: This method of battle seems ineffective, as opponents can escape in the meantime
name: Electabuzz

text: Electabuzz typically resides near power plants and can cause blackouts in cities, though it can also be found in grasslands
name: Electabuzz

text: Magmar's body is designed to let it camouflage itself in fire, so it is mainly red and yellow all over
name: Magmar

text: It has a flame pattern on its torso, and a fire on its tail, similar to Charmander and Chimchar (though Chimchar's fire actually is its tail)
name: Magmar

text: It has a large beak that can spit out fire, thus giving it the species name the 'Spitfire' Pokémon
name: Magmar

text: Magmar have the ability Flame Body
name: Magmar

text: Flame Body has a 30% chance of burning a foe that physically attacks Magmar
name: Magmar

text: Its body temperature is 2,200 Degrees Fahrenheit
name: Magmar

text: Its body shimmers like the sun and its breath can cause miniature heat waves around it
name: Magmar

text: Magmar is the evolved form of Magby
name: Magmar

text: Magby can evolve into a Magmar starting at level 30
name: Magmar

text: Magmar can evolve into a Magmortar, but only by trading while holding the item Magmarizer, Alternatively in Pokémon Legends: Arceus, Magmar evolves when exposed to a Magmarizer
name: Magmar

text: Magmar is a bipedal Pokémon that has a red body with yellow flame designs along the bottom half
name: Magmar

text: It has a puckered tan beak, small eyes, and two lumps on its forehead with a yellow flame on top of each one
name: Magmar

text: Rigid, red scales cover its arms and it has five, clawed fingers on each hand
name: Magmar

text: Magmar's shoulders and thighs are yellow, and its red feet have two, clawed toes each
name: Magmar

text: It has black, metal shackles around its neck and ankles
name: Magmar

text: Down its back is a row of red spikes, and there is a flame at the tip of its tapering, yellow tail
name: Magmar

text: Magmar's body temperature is nearly 2,200° Fahrenheit (1,200° Celsius), giving its body an orange glow
name: Magmar

text: Because it hates cold places, this Pokémon typically resides in and around active volcanoes where it is born from
name: Magmar

text: This Pokémon has even been known to spit scorching flames to establish an ideally warm environment for itself
name: Magmar

text: The Magmar found in Alola are said be to sturdier than Magmar found elsewhere
name: Magmar

text: In battle, Magmar blows out intense flames from all over its body to intimidate its foes and incinerate its surroundings
name: Magmar

text: The anime has shown that extremely well-trained Magmar can block Electric-type attacks with super-heated air
name: Magmar

text: However, an outmatched Magmar will quickly retreat, using its fiery camouflage and its wavering, rippling glare to blend into any present fires
name: Magmar

text: As stated in the Pokémon Adventures manga, Magmar is very persistent and will hunt down anyone who manages to defeat it
name: Magmar

text: It is able to heal its wounds and weariness by soaking in lava
name: Magmar

text: Magmar has a bad habit of unintentionally burning its prey to a crisp
name: Magmar

text: Its body is always constantly burning
name: Magmar

text: Magmar is feared as one of the many causes of fires
name: Magmar

text: They seem to be based on a flat-stag beetle and have long, pricked horns on their heads
name: Pinsir

text: Their whole body is a light brown color with three claws on each limb
name: Pinsir

text: Their mouths have multiple sharp teeth arranged horizontally rather than vertically
name: Pinsir

text: Their feet are thicker than their hands
name: Pinsir

text: As Mega Pinsir, it gains a large pair of clear, yellow wings with an area of orange venation near the base
name: Pinsir

text: Additionally, a set of brown elytra appear
name: Pinsir

text: Slicing through each side of the elytra is a pair of orange blades
name: Pinsir

text: Its arms are longer and it has a T-shaped spike on each forearm
name: Pinsir

text: The pincers on its head are now longer with larger spikes, and its eyes are now yellow
name: Pinsir

text: Pinsir are known for their strong pincers, using them aggressively in battle to either split foes into two or toss foes that are too tough to be crushed
name: Pinsir

text: Despite this nature, they grow weak in cold environments and will bury into dirt, sand, or leaves with their two pincers sticking up from the ground
name: Pinsir

text: They are also known to enjoy tree sap and Honey like many other Bug-type Pokémon
name: Pinsir

text: Pinsir lives deep in the temperate forests and jungles, where it burrows underground or hides in the treetops on nights cold enough to render it immobile
name: Pinsir

text: They tend to group together as a result
name: Pinsir

text: In the Alola region, they are known to get along well with Heracross while they have a strong rivalry with Vikavolt
name: Pinsir

text: The size of their pincers are used to judge attractiveness, the bigger the more attractive
name: Pinsir

text: When they mega evolve, Pinsir appears to be in a constant state of excitement and rarely touches the ground due to its newfound flight
name: Pinsir

text: Pinsir can have the ability Hyper Cutter or the ability Mold Breaker
name: Pinsir

text: Hyper Cutter prevents reduction of Pinsir's Attack stat
name: Pinsir

text: Mold Breaker allows Pinsir to use moves that would otherwise be non-effective because of an ability
name: Pinsir

text: Very rarely, they may have Moxie, which boosts their Attack by one stage after they defeat an opponent
name: Pinsir

text: A Pinsir's horns can crush many objects and allow it to pick up extremely heavy things
name: Pinsir

text: All Mega Pinsir have the ability Aerilate, which converts all their Normal moves into Flying type moves, making them stronger too
name: Pinsir

text: They can fly at about 30mph/50 km/h and use their horns to pierce enemies before shreading them
name: Pinsir

text: In fact, it can lift something 10 times its weight and still fly easily
name: Pinsir

text: Pinsir does not evolve, but it does Mega Evolve using its Pinsirite
name: Pinsir

text: Pinsir is a bipedal, coleopteran insectoid Pokémon with a wide, dull-brown body divided into segments by thin lines
name: Pinsir

text: On top of its head is a large pair of gray, spiky pincers on top of its head
name: Pinsir

text: In its mouth are many long, flat teeth arranged horizontally and it has triangular eyes
name: Pinsir

text: Capable of seeing color to some degree, Pinsir appears to be attracted to the color green
name: Pinsir

text: Its legs are short and thick, while its arms are long and thin
name: Pinsir

text: It has three claws on each hand and foot two of its toes face forward and one backward
name: Pinsir

text: Pinsir can use its pincers to crush, toss, bludgeon, or tear opponents lift things twice its weight and shatter logs
name: Pinsir

text: Captured prey is kept in place by the piercing thorns and sheer strength of Pinsir's horns and will not be released until they are torn in half
name: Pinsir

text: In addition to hunting prey, the anime has shown that it enjoys tree sap
name: Pinsir

text: Pinsir lives deep in the temperate forests and jungles, where it burrows underground or hides in the treetops on nights cold enough to render it immobile
name: Pinsir

text: In Alola, it has a rivalry with Vikavolt and gets along with Heracross
name: Pinsir

text: Pinsir are known to judge each other based on their pincers
name: Pinsir

text: The pincers determine its popularity with the opposite gender based on how more thick and impressive it looks
name: Pinsir

text: As Mega Pinsir, it gains a large pair of clear, yellow wings with an area of orange venation near the base
name: Pinsir

text: Additionally, a set of brown elytra appear
name: Pinsir

text: Slicing through each elytron is a pair of orange blades
name: Pinsir

text: Its arms become longer and it has a T-shaped spike on each forearm
name: Pinsir

text: The pincers on its head are now longer with larger spikes, and its eyes are now yellow
name: Pinsir

text: When it Mega Evolves, Pinsir is left in a constant state of excitement
name: Pinsir

text: It rarely touches the ground due to its ability to now fly
name: Pinsir

text: Mega Pinsir can travel up to approximately 30mph (50km/h) and uses its two large horns to pierce its enemies before shredding them
name: Pinsir

text: Mega Pinsir can lift opponents up to 10 times heavier than itself with its horns and still fly around easily
name: Pinsir

text: Tauros resembles a bull
name: Tauros

text: He is a tan color, with a brown mane that covers part of his stout body, a slightly chubby belly, somewhat fat haunches, and a hump on his back
name: Tauros

text: Tauros has blue hooves and horns
name: Tauros

text: He also has three long tails
name: Tauros

text: On his head, he has three blue circles from his forehead down to his eyes
name: Tauros

text: Tauros is a violent, rowdy Pokémon that whips itself into a frenzy using its three tails
name: Tauros

text: It serves as a warning to others that Tauros is about to charge with astonishing speed
name: Tauros

text: Once it starts charging, it is unable to stop or change course until it hits something
name: Tauros

text: It will lock horns with others of its kind, and the herd's protector takes pride in its battle-scarred horns
name: Tauros

text: While still ferocious, Tauros are calmer in Alola than elsewhere, likely due to the region's climate
name: Tauros

text: The practice of riding Tauros is believed to have started in Alola
name: Tauros

text: However, Tauros in Galar are more volatile and don't want to be ridden
name: Tauros

text: In Paldea, Tauros are bred into three different subspecies (Combat, Blaze, and Aqua), each with specific traits
name: Tauros

text: Combat Breed Tauros are fierce and possess a muscular build
name: Tauros

text: They are experts of close-ranged combat and will use their horns to gore at enemies
name: Tauros

text: Blaze Breed Tauros increase the temperature of their horns to a blistering 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit
name: Tauros

text: The horns leave the opponent with burn marks and wounds
name: Tauros

text: The tails of a Blaze Breed Tauros is unique in that they are intertwined rather than separated
name: Tauros

text: Aqua Breed Tauros has more body fat, which allows them to easily float on the water's surface
name: Tauros

text: Their horns are capable of expelling high pressurized water jets that not only aid in propulsion but also have enough strength to pierce through enemy defenses
name: Tauros

text: It lives and travels in herds on plains and grasslands
name: Tauros

text: Tauros can have the ability Intimidate or the ability Anger Point
name: Tauros

text: Intimidate decreases the opponent's Attacks by one level when Tauros is sent out
name: Tauros

text: Anger Point increases Tauros' Attack to the max level when he is hit with a critical hit
name: Tauros

text: He also has a Dream World ability in Sheer Force
name: Tauros

text: He has a violent nature, and charges towards foes rampantly
name: Tauros

text: He wills himself to fight by whipping himself with his tails
name: Tauros

text: Tauros is a quadrupedal, bovine Pokémon
name: Tauros

text: It is covered in light brown fur with a thick, darker brown mane around the neck
name: Tauros

text: It has a rounded muzzle with a dark brown nose, small, triangular eyes, three gray bumps running vertically down its forehead, and a pair of curved, gray horns growing from atop its head
name: Tauros

text: Each of its three black tails has a tuft of fur on the end, and there is a single gray hoof on each foot
name: Tauros

text: Tauros is a male-only species
name: Tauros

text: Tauros is a violent, rowdy Pokémon that whips itself into a frenzy using its three tails
name: Tauros

text: It serves as a warning to others that Tauros is about to charge with astonishing speed
name: Tauros

text: Once it starts charging, it is unable to stop or change course until it hits something
name: Tauros

text: It lives and travels in herds on plains and grasslands
name: Tauros

text: It will lock horns with others of its kind, and the herd's protector takes pride in its battle-scarred horns
name: Tauros

text: While still ferocious, Tauros are calmer in Alola than elsewhere, likely due to the region's climate
name: Tauros

text: The practice of riding Tauros is believed to have started in Alola
name: Tauros

text: However, Tauros in Galar are more volatile and don't want to be ridden
name: Tauros

text: A Tauros' herd protector takes pride in its battle-scarred horns
name: Tauros

text: In Paldea, Tauros has a similar appearance to its Kantonian counterpart
name: Tauros

text: All three forms of Paldean Tauros are covered in black fur, a thick black mane, dark gray hooves, and black tail
name: Tauros

text: It has two grey bumps, one small and one big, running vertically on its forehead
name: Tauros

text: The Blaze Breed is exclusive to Pokemon Scarlet, while the Aqua Breed is exclusive to Pokemon Violet
name: Tauros

text: The main difference between the forms is the horns, mane, and tail
name: Tauros

text: The Combat Breed has two straight grey horns, a thick black mane and shorter black tufts on its tail compared to Kantonian Tauros
name: Tauros

text: Blaze Breed has two grey curved horns pointing forward,a thick spiky black mane with red lines, and three short tufts intertwined to the tails
name: Tauros

text: The Aqua Breed has curved horns pointed up, black mane with five blue lines shaped like a beard, finally three tuffs attack to three bended tails connected to one tail
name: Tauros

text: Combat Breed Tauros is known for its thick, powerful muscles and aggressive nature
name: Tauros

text: Thanks to its its muscular body, Tauros is skilled at close-quarter combat
name: Tauros

text: It uses its horns to strike at an opponent's weak spot
name: Tauros

text: Blaze Breed Tauros earns its name from the hot air is breathes from its nostrils
name: Tauros

text: When channeling its energy, the horns of Tauros can reach a temperature of 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit
name: Tauros

text: Anyone gorged by Blaze Breed Tauros' horns will suffer both wounds and burns
name: Tauros

text: Aqua Breed Tauros is recognized for its high body fat, which allows it to float easily in the water
name: Tauros

text: Tauros can swim by using its horns, unleashing high-pressure jet water from them
name: Tauros

text: It can use the same high-pressure jet water as a form of attacking, piercing any enemy it hits
name: Tauros

text: Tauros and its Paldean Form are the only known Pokémon capable of learning the move Raging Bull
name: Tauros

text: Magikarp is a Fish Pokémon
name: Magikarp

text: Its body is made up of/covered in red scales
name: Magikarp

text: Its fins are either yellow or white
name: Magikarp

text: They also have whiskers or Maxilliary Barbells
name: Magikarp

text: Female Magikarp have white barbells while male Magikarp have yellow barbells
name: Magikarp

text: Magikarp refers to them as his magnificent barbs in PokéPark Wii: Pikachu's Adventure
name: Magikarp

text: The way to tell a male and female Magikarp apart is that a male Magikarp has gold whiskers while a female has white whiskers
name: Magikarp

text: In Pokémon GO and its Water Event, the whiskers of the female Magikarp appears to be white silver or platinum
name: Magikarp

text: This also applies when it evolves into a female Gyarados as its whiskers remain white silver than its original blue
name: Magikarp

text: Magikarp are often regarded as the “most useless Pokémon
name: Magikarp

text: ” The most they normally can do is use Splash, which does absolutely nothing
name: Magikarp

text: Although they can reach heights of 7 feet using this move, they are unable to change direction in the air, so they land in the exact same place
name: Magikarp

text: Legend has it that older Magikarp can splash over mountains, though this has never been seen
name: Magikarp

text: In fact, splashing Magikarp actually make easy prey for Flying-type Pokémon like Pidgeotto, who can snatch them up as they bounce
name: Magikarp

text: They are also weak swimmers, unable to swim through even weak currents
name: Magikarp

text: As a result, many of them congregate in small ponds or lakes, unable swim through river currents
name: Magikarp

text: Magikarp are very hardy, however, with strong survival instincts and immune systems
name: Magikarp

text: They are able to tolerate waters of nearly any salinity, depth, and pollution level
name: Magikarp

text: A shiny Magikarp
name: Magikarp

text: Despite being strong in the past, its present-day descendants are considerably weaker
name: Magikarp

text: It struggles to swim against even the weakest of currents
name: Magikarp

text: Magikarp are often seen as prey to Pokémon such as Pidgeot, which swoop them from the water's surface, and Meowth
name: Magikarp

text: Magikarp evolves into Gyarados at level 20
name: Magikarp

text: Magikarp is a piscine Pokémon with large, heavy reddish-orange scales
name: Magikarp

text: It has large, vacant eyes and pink lips
name: Magikarp

text: Its pectoral and tail fins are white
name: Magikarp

text: On its back is a stiff, three-peaked yellow fin, resembling a crown there is an identical fin on its underside
name: Magikarp

text: It also has long barbels
name: Magikarp

text: The barbels are white on a female and pale-yellow on a male
name: Magikarp

text: A long-lived Magikarp is able to utilize its immense splashing power to leap high enough to scale mountains
name: Magikarp

text: It also has a strong enough immune system to survive in the most polluted of waters
name: Magikarp

text: However, it is usually overlooked by Trainers because of its perceived weakness: even in the heat of battle, it will do nothing but flop around
name: Magikarp

text: It is believed that the ancestors of Magikarp were actually much stronger than modern Magikarp, and this led scientists to research this species
name: Magikarp

text: Magikarp is found in many bodies of water, such as lakes, rivers, and ponds
name: Magikarp

text: However, due to its weak swimming ability, it usually lives downstream of the water's flow
name: Magikarp

text: In Generation I, Splash was its signature move
name: Magikarp

text: It is often seen using Splash to leap out of the water, which makes it an easy target for predators such as Pidgeotto and Pidgeot
name: Magikarp

text: Frillish is also known to prey on Magikarp
name: Magikarp

text: In Hoppy Town, there are at least 31 unique pattern varieties of Magikarp, with their scales coming in colors such as gray, black, white, purple, pink, violet, apricot, and brown
name: Magikarp

text: These patterns can be classified by groups, depending on how the Magikarp looks while it is still small a specific pattern arises when it becomes bigger
name: Magikarp

text: Which patterns can be caught depend on the type of Old Rod the better the rod, the more groups of patterns can be fished
name: Magikarp

text: The people in Hoppy Town train their Magikarp to jump the highest in order to compete in a series of Leagues to win prizes
name: Magikarp

text: It is a dragon-like Pokémon that is serpentine in shape and covered in blue and yellow scales
name: Gyarados

text: It has white fins on top of its body and it has a tan underbelly
name: Gyarados

text: It has fins on the side of its face and a large, blue crest on its forehead
name: Gyarados

text: Like Magikarp, it has whiskers which are either yellow or white
name: Gyarados

text: Female Gyarados have light whiskers which are white
name: Gyarados

text: In Pokémon GO and its Water Event, female Gyarados' whiskers are now white/silver or platinum after evolving from a female Magikarp
name: Gyarados

text: Gyarados are known to be extremely violent, often flying into an Outrage and destroying anything they see
name: Gyarados

text: This includes small towns that stand on their wake
name: Gyarados

text: This is likely due to them having undergone structural brain transformation that stimulated their brain cells, leading to them becoming ferocious
name: Gyarados

text: Mega Gyarados are monstrously destructive creatures due to the stress imposed on their brains by Mega Evolution, leaving them of nearly nothing but the dangerous instinct to raze everything into cinders
name: Gyarados

text: Despite their violent disposition, Gyarados can be obedient to trainers that they love and trust and can be very misunderstood they never intentionally destroy things and instead they just have anger problems
name: Gyarados

text: When they aren't angry, they are actually quite timid and gentle for a short-tempered sea serpent
name: Gyarados

text: Gyarados have the ability to incinerate everything on their paths with one single powerful Hyper Beam
name: Gyarados

text: Mega Gyarados are known to travel in Mach speed by jetting water with their side orifices
name: Gyarados

text: With such speed, they can split large ships into two
name: Gyarados

text: Gyarados is the evolved form of Magikarp as of level 20
name: Gyarados

text: Gyarados is a piscine Pokémon with a long serpentine body covered in slightly overlapping scales
name: Gyarados

text: It is mostly blue with a yellow underbelly, and it has a row of yellow spots down each side
name: Gyarados

text: Its mouth is very large and gaping, bearing four pointed teeth and yellow lips
name: Gyarados

text: It has one barbel and a small white fin on each side of its face
name: Gyarados

text: The barbels are white on a female and blue on a male
name: Gyarados

text: It has small, red eyes, a three-pointed, dark blue crest on its head, and four white, spiky dorsal fins
name: Gyarados

text: Gyarados's tail fin is similar in structure to the crest on its head, except with a thin, white fin spread between the points
name: Gyarados

text: The process of evolution causes a change in its brain structure that is believed to cause its violent nature
name: Gyarados

text: Gyarados's fangs can crush stones and its scales are harder than steel
name: Gyarados

text: Gyarados is feared for its fierce temper and wanton destructive tendencies since ancient times
name: Gyarados

text: In some regions, Gyarados is called the deity of destruction because of this
name: Gyarados

text: It appears in times of conflict and destroys the surrounding area
name: Gyarados

text: Its rampages have been known to last a month at a time
name: Gyarados

text: These rampages can occur even during a harsh storm
name: Gyarados

text: A Gyarados's rage won't stop completely until everything is destroyed
name: Gyarados

text: Some believed any place is fated to be destroyed should a Gyarados appear
name: Gyarados

text: Gyarados lives in both fresh and salty waters
name: Gyarados

text: Both Gyarados and its Mega form have demonstrated in the anime that it can leap huge distances both from the water and from the ground, usually several times its own body length
name: Gyarados

text: However, Gyarados is rarely seen in the wild
name: Gyarados

text: The move Hyper Beam is often associated with Gyarados due to it being being powerful enough to instantly destroy everything it hits
name: Gyarados

text: When it Mega Evolves, Gyarados becomes bulkier
name: Gyarados

text: The fins on its cheeks become longer and gain a yellow tint
name: Gyarados

text: Its crest is larger and black, and its barbels also gain considerable length
name: Gyarados

text: A large spike extends downward underneath its chin, and it now has a black underside with a red stripe around the edges
name: Gyarados

text: The yellow spots along its body are replaced by raised red scales, which propel Mega Gyarados through the water
name: Gyarados

text: Two large yellow fins with blue spines appear on its back
name: Gyarados

text: Most of the other fins along its back disappear, replaced by two rows of blue spikes
name: Gyarados

text: There are now four yellowish, spiky fins near its tail: two on its back and two on its underside
name: Gyarados

text: Due the stress Mega Evolution puts on a Gyarados's body, it becomes even more ferocious than before
name: Gyarados

text: All other brain functions cease when Mega Evolution occurs, except for the destructive drive to burn down anything into cinders
name: Gyarados

text: Despite its brain having a powerful destructive instinct, it will obey a Trainer it truly trusts
name: Gyarados

text: Mega Gyarados can launch at Mach Speed by using its orifices to release water from both sides
name: Gyarados

text: With this speed, it has enough power to split large ships in two
name: Gyarados

text: Mega Gyarados is tied with Hoopa Unbound as the tallest Dark-type
name: Gyarados

text: Lapras is a very large Water/Ice-type Pokémon that resembles a plesiosaur
name: Lapras

text: Its skin is mainly a light blue with a cream/white underside
name: Lapras

text: It has a very long neck with a rounded head
name: Lapras

text: Its ears are shaped like spirals and it has a small horn on its forehead
name: Lapras

text: Having no legs, it instead has four flippers for easy mobility in the water
name: Lapras

text: Lapras also has a large, gray shell on its backs with knobs covering them
name: Lapras

text: When it Gigantamaxes, it becomes much larger and its shell resembles a cruise ship
name: Lapras

text: Its eyes now have a yellow, blue, and white color scheme
name: Lapras

text: A ring of an icy music score surrounds it
name: Lapras

text: Lapras is a gentle, helpful Pokémon that enjoys ferrying people across bodies of water
name: Lapras

text: In the past, its docility made it an easy target for hunters, and it was driven to near-extinction
name: Lapras

text: Recent protection efforts have seen Lapras become overabundant instead, which is now affecting the fish Pokémon numbers in some areas
name: Lapras

text: An intelligent Pokémon, it is able to understand human speech
name: Lapras

text: Lapras have been known to travel in large pods across the seas, spanning both polar and tropical areas
name: Lapras

text: To keep in touch with other of its kind, it sings enchanting melodies
name: Lapras

text: In the anime it was shown that Lapras is able to develop psychic abilities such as telepathy
name: Lapras

text: They live out in the ocean near polar and tropical areas
name: Lapras

text: Lapras can have the ability Water Absorb or the ability Shell Armor
name: Lapras

text: With Water Absorb, Lapras can heal 1/4 of its max HP if it is hit with a Water-type attack
name: Lapras

text: With the ability Shell Armor, Lapras can block any Critical Hits
name: Lapras

text: Its hidden ability hydration will heal all its Status conditions in Rain
name: Lapras

text: In addition to this, Lapras can ferry people on its back and also sing people to sleep
name: Lapras

text: Some Lapras can use Telepathy to communicate with humans as well
name: Lapras

text: Its Gigantamax form is said to be able to ferry 5000 people at one go and the music score can smash through icebergs, like Walrein using its Headbutts
name: Lapras

text: Lapras is a marine reptilian Pokémon that resembles a plesiosaur
name: Lapras

text: It has a blue hide with darker blue spots and a cream-colored underside
name: Lapras

text: It has large brown eyes, a short horn on its forehead, and tightly curled ears
name: Lapras

text: It has a long neck and four flippers
name: Lapras

text: The foremost flippers are larger than the hind
name: Lapras

text: On its back is a heavy, gray shell covered in blunt knobs
name: Lapras

text: Lapras is a gentle, helpful Pokémon that enjoys ferrying people across bodies of water
name: Lapras

text: In the past, its docility made it an easy target for hunters, and it was driven to near-extinction
name: Lapras

text: Recent protection efforts have seen Lapras become overabundant instead, which is now affecting the fish Pokémon numbers in some areas
name: Lapras

text: An intelligent Pokémon, it is able to understand human speech
name: Lapras

text: Lapras have been known to travel in large pods across the seas, spanning both polar and tropical areas
name: Lapras

text: To keep in touch with other of its kind, it sings enchanting melodies
name: Lapras

text: In the anime it was shown that Lapras is able to develop psychic abilities such as telepathy
name: Lapras

text: As Gigantamax Lapras, it becomes larger in size and more armored
name: Lapras

text: Its shell resembles a cruise ship or ocarina with four gray and red stripes surrounding it, and it has four spikes on top of its shell with one steel spike resembling a funnel, which has three red clouds surrounding it
name: Lapras

text: The sclera in Lapras' eyes change colors to white, yellow, and blue
name: Lapras

text: A light blue ring of fine thin lines resembling a musical sheet created from ice particles circles around its shell
name: Lapras

text: 5,000 people can ride on the shell of Gigantamax Lapras for a very comfortable ride without any issues
name: Lapras

name: Lapras

text: Gigantamax Lapras is the only known Pokémon capable of using the G-Max Move G-Max Resonance
